attributes.action: Enforce Entry Clearance Officers to comply with law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that Entry Clearance officers within the British Embassy in Beijing have not been quoting Section 2 Paragraph 43 of the Immigration and Asylum Act 2002, when issuing notices of refusal. We petition that Entry Clearance officers are monitored more closely. So that further Visitors Entry clearance applications are not refused illegally.
